studyArms.name: BIVV009 Treatment Arm
studyArms.description: All participants receive BIVV009 IV infusion. Dosing is based on body weight: 6.5g for <75kg or 7.5g for ≥75kg. Dosing schedule: Day 0, Day 7, and then every 14 days thereafter.

studyCohorts.name: Primary CAgD with recent transfusion
studyCohorts.characteristic: Patients with primary cold agglutinin disease who have a history of at least one documented blood transfusion within 6 months of enrollment.

studyElements.name: BIVV009 Treatment Arm - Screening/Observation Period
studyElements.description: Treatment period for BIVV009 Treatment Arm during Screening/Observation Period

studyElements.name: BIVV009 Treatment Arm - Part A Treatment Phase
studyElements.description: Treatment period for BIVV009 Treatment Arm during Part A Treatment Phase

studyElements.name: BIVV009 Treatment Arm - Part B Extension Phase
studyElements.description: Treatment period for BIVV009 Treatment Arm during Part B Extension Phase

studyElements.name: BIVV009 Treatment Arm - Safety Follow-up
studyElements.description: Treatment period for BIVV009 Treatment Arm during Safety Follow-up

arms.name: BIVV009 Treatment Arm
arms.description: All participants receive BIVV009 IV infusion. Dosing is based on body weight: 6.5g for <75kg or 7.5g for ≥75kg. Dosing schedule: Day 0, Day 7, and then every 14 days thereafter.

cohorts.name: Primary CAgD with recent transfusion
cohorts.characteristic: Patients with primary cold agglutinin disease who have a history of at least one documented blood transfusion within 6 months of enrollment.

epochs.name: Screening/Observation Period
epochs.description: Day -42 to Day -1; includes medical history and characterization of CAgD biomarkers.

epochs.name: Part A Treatment Phase
epochs.description: Initial 6-month (26 weeks) treatment period to assess efficacy and safety.

epochs.name: Part B Extension Phase
epochs.description: Long-term safety and durability of response phase running for 2 years following last patient out from Part A.

epochs.name: Safety Follow-up
epochs.description: 9 weeks after administration of the last dose of study drug for PK, PD, and ADA collection.
